title: Multimodal Instructional Design for Arabic Language Learning: Integrated Image-Audio Strategy

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Arabic Grammar and Understanding of Everyday Conversations
context.additional_context: Project-based Arabic vocational training in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Learners can achieve over 80% accuracy in listening comprehension of Arabic vocabulary and basic sentences through image-audio integrated learning
Learners can produce PBL artifacts covering module-specific themes (e.g., business negotiation, cultural introduction) in Arabic with over 70% completion quality
Learners can improve Arabic pronunciation and listening skills by over 25% compared to baseline assessments using multimedia learning software

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
